value.title: Quickly create icons for your Power BI reports (with some A.I. help)
value.excerpt: If you are creating Power BI reports, you are probably in need of icons for all types of things, and finding them is not always easy. value.title: Real time dashboards in Power BI with Stream Analytics
value.excerpt: Good evening, in today's video I will show you how to create a live stream, real time dashboard using an IoT device and Azure IOT hub, stream analytics and Power BI.
